titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation forbidding the disorderly trading with the saluages in New England in America, especially the furnishing of the natiues in those and other parts of America by the English with weapons, and habiliments of warre.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of text.
"Giuen at Our Court at Whitehall, the foure and twentieth day of Nouember, in the sixt yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
